All functions

Model Agnostic Sequential Variable Attributions

break_down_uncertainty() shap()

describe()

Generates Textual Explanations for Predictive Models

Model Agnostic Sequential Variable attributions

local_interactions()

Plot Shap (Break Down Uncertainty) Objects in D3 with r2d3 package.
